title: Best of The Program | Guest: Dr. Richard Bartlett | 10/2/20
description:
President Trump and the first lady have tested positive for COVID-19 hours after aide Hope Hicks tested positive. In a new low for the media, CNN released the “Melania tapes” and disgustingly spun her statements on Christmas and children at the border. But is their attack boosting support for Melania? Will the mark of the beast not be a physical mark? We’re facing a spiritual battle first and foremost. Dr. Richard Bartlett joins to discuss the latest coronavirus treatments.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
